entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
